text: is a Japanese television jidaigeki or period drama that was broadcast in 1986. It is the 26th in the Hissatsu series. Inspired by Video game Super Mario Bros.. ==Cast== * Kunihiko Mitamura as Hide * Yoko Akino as Keima no Ogin * Shōfukutei Tsurube II as Ayamaro * Teruhiko Saigō as Toukichi * Mikio Osawa as Sabu * Masako Sugawara as Wakamurasaki * Gorō Mutsumi as Kagurazaka Soemon * Juukei Fujioka as Mukojima Jinjurō ==References== Category:1986 Japanese television series debuts Category:1980s drama television series Category:Jidaigeki television series
title: Hissatsu Masshigura!
